trans-unit.source: The <see cref="N:System.Drawing" /> namespace provides access to GDI+ basic graphics functionality.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="N:System.Drawing" /> 命名空间提供了对 GDI+ 基本图形功能的访问权限。

trans-unit.source: More advanced functionality is provided in the <see cref="N:System.Drawing.Drawing2D" />, <see cref="N:System.Drawing.Imaging" />, and <see cref="N:System.Drawing.Text" /> namespaces.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="N:System.Drawing.Drawing2D" />、<see cref="N:System.Drawing.Imaging" /> 和 <see cref="N:System.Drawing.Text" /> 命名空间中提供了更高级功能。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> class provides methods for drawing to the display device.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>类提供了绘制到显示设备的方法。

trans-unit.source: Classes such as <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle> and <xref:System.Drawing.Point> encapsulate GDI+ primitives.
The <xref:System.Drawing.Pen> class is used to draw lines and curves, while classes derived from the abstract class <xref:System.Drawing.Brush> are used to fill the interiors of shapes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>类用于绘制直线和曲线，从抽象类派生的类时<xref:System.Drawing.Brush>用于填充的形状的内部。

trans-unit.source: Classes within the <xref:System.Drawing> namespace are not supported for use within a Windows or ASP.NET service.
trans-unit.target: 类中<xref:System.Drawing>用于 Windows 或 ASP.NET 服务中不支持命名空间。

trans-unit.source: Attempting to use these classes from within one of these application types may produce unexpected problems, such as diminished service performance and run-time exceptions.
trans-unit.target: 尝试使用这些应用程序类型之一中的这些类可能会产生意外的问题，如降低服务性能和运行时异常。

trans-unit.source: For a supported alternative, see [Windows Imaging Components](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ee719654\(v=vs.85\).aspx).
trans-unit.target: 有关受支持的替代方法，请参阅[Windows 映像组件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ee719654\(v=vs.85\).aspx)。
